meanings.definition: The female of the red deer.
meanings.sent1: The hinds gracefully roamed the forest.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of hinds grazing in the meadow.
meanings.sent3: The hinds decided to have a race to see who was the fastest.
meanings.sent4: Her agility on the dance floor was like that of a hind.
meanings.sent5: The hinds' gentle eyes reflected the beauty of nature.

meanings.definition: The rear part of an animal's body, especially when considered as the seat of the power of motion.
meanings.sent1: The horse's hinds kicked up dust as it galloped.
meanings.sent2: Be careful not to startle the cow from behind, near its hinds.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous puppy kept chasing its own hinds in circles.
meanings.sent4: The car's engine was the hind, propelling it forward.
meanings.sent5: The kangaroo's powerful hinds helped it leap great distances.
